thread.title: Adele fans SLAM the BRIT Awards for not nominating singer for best female solo artist
thread.title_full: Adele fans SLAM the BRIT Awards for not nominating singer for best female solo artist

author: JJ Nattrass
title: Adele fans SLAM the BRIT Awards for not nominating singer for best female solo artist
text:
Adele fans SLAM the BRIT Awards for not nominating singer for best female solo artist The singer, 28, wasn't even nominated for best female Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Adele fans took to Twitter in their droves tonight to criticise the BRIT Awards for not nominating her for best British Female Solo Artist. 
The Hello singer bagged the Global Success Award at this year's awards. 
Meanwhile, Emeli Sande won best female after she was nominated along with Anohni, Ellie Goulding, Lianne La Havas and Nao were nominated. 
And Adele fans were outraged the Tottenham-born singer wasn't even nominated. Adele won the Global Success Award (Photo: ITV) 
Fans said it was a "joke" Adele wasn't considered for best female. 
Mirror Online have contacted the BRIT Awards for a comment. 
Last week, Adele sent the entertainment world into meltdown when she appeared to confirm at the Grammys that she'd married Simon Konecki . 
Rumours first started to surface that the couple had tied the knot when the Rolling In The Deep singer was seen sporting a gold band on her ring finger in Beverly Hills, in December. Keeping it in a low-key? (Photo: Getty Images North America) Rumours surrounding her reported marriage reached fever-pitch at the Grammys (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
And after weeks of speculation regarding the couple's relationship status, she appeared to confirm that they had indeed tied the knot as she gave an emotional speech at the Grammys thanking her "husband'" for his support. 
The couple - who have been an item for five years - have one child together, four-year-old Angelo . Like us on Facebook
